article_title: GOP egos more important than serving citizens
article_text:
October 2, 2013 at 11:15 am EDT | by Lateefah Williams

GOP egos more important than serving U.S. citizens

article_metadata.description: On Oct. 1, congressional Republicans allowed the federal government to shut down for the first time in 17 years.
